Card Description:
Duration: Weeks 1-2
Owner: Technical Lead
Goal: Configure production environment (SSL, email, secrets, backups)

Budget: £5,149
Effort: 60 hours
Checklist Items: SSL certificate installed and A+ rating achieved|Production email sending notifications|Secrets encrypted and secured|Gunicorn + Systemd service running|Automated backups configured and tested|Load testing passed (<2s avg response, <1% errors)|Monitoring and alerting operational|Security audit passed|Documentation complete and reviewed

Card Description:
Install Let's Encrypt SSL certificate for HTTPS access. Configure Nginx reverse proxy and Django security settings.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 1
**Resources:** SSL_SETUP_GUIDE.md

**Acceptance Criteria:**
Checklist Items: Domain name configured and DNS pointing to server|Certbot installed and SSL certificate obtained|Nginx configured with SSL (ports 80→443 redirect)|Django settings updated (SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT=True, HSTS enabled)|HTTPS accessible at production URL|SSL Labs test: A or A+ rating|Certificate auto-renewal tested (dry-run successful)

Card Description:
Configure SMTP email backend (Gmail or SendGrid) for system notifications.

**Effort:** 2 hours
**Week:** 1
**Dependencies:** None
Checklist Items: Email service selected (Gmail SMTP or SendGrid)|Django settings.py updated (EMAIL_BACKEND, EMAIL_HOST, EMAIL_PORT, EMAIL_USE_TLS)|Test email sent successfully|Leave approval notification tested|2FA code email tested|Password reset email tested|Email logs reviewed (no errors)

Card Description:
Secure sensitive configuration data (.env file encryption or Vault).

**Effort:** 2 hours
**Week:** 1
**Dependencies:** Task 1.1 (SSL), Task 1.2 (Email)
Checklist Items: Environment file encrypted or migrated to Vault|SECRET_KEY secured|Database credentials secured|Email password secured|API keys secured (if any)|Environment variables loaded correctly in production|Test application startup with encrypted secrets|No plaintext secrets in Git history

Card Description:
Configure Gunicorn as production WSGI server with Systemd for auto-start.

**Effort:** 3 hours
**Week:** 1
**Dependencies:** Task 1.1 (SSL)
Checklist Items: Gunicorn installed: pip3 install gunicorn|Gunicorn config file created (workers, timeout, logging)|Systemd service file created: /etc/systemd/system/staff-rota.service|Service enabled: sudo systemctl enable staff-rota|Service started: sudo systemctl start staff-rota|Service auto-starts on reboot (tested)|Application accessible via Nginx → Gunicorn|Static files served correctly|Logs written to /var/log/gunicorn/

Card Description:
Set up automated daily/weekly backups for database and media files.

**Effort:** 3 hours
**Week:** 2
**Dependencies:** Task 1.4 (Gunicorn)
Checklist Items: Backup script created: /usr/local/bin/backup-staff-rota.sh|Daily database dump: SQLite → .db file with timestamp|Weekly media files backup: /media/ → archive|Cron job scheduled: daily at 2am, weekly Sunday 3am|Backup location: NVMe drive + cloud (Google Drive/S3)|Restoration tested successfully (restore to test environment)|Backup retention policy: 30 daily, 12 weekly|Alert on backup failure (email notification)|Documentation: BACKUP_PROCEDURES.md created

Card Description:
Perform load testing with 50+ concurrent users using Apache JMeter or Locust.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 2
**Dependencies:** Task 1.4, Task 1.5
Checklist Items: Load testing tool installed (JMeter or Locust)|Test scenarios created (dashboards, leave requests, shifts, AI queries, charts, ML)|50 concurrent users simulated|Peak load: 100 req/s for 10 minutes|Average response time < 2 seconds|95th percentile < 3 seconds|Error rate < 1%|Database connection pool stable|Server resources monitored (CPU, RAM, disk I/O)|Results documented: LOAD_TESTING_RESULTS.md

Card Description:
Configure Sentry for error tracking and uptime monitoring.

**Effort:** 2 hours
**Week:** 2
**Dependencies:** Task 1.4 (Gunicorn)
Checklist Items: Sentry account created (free tier: 5k errors/month)|Django Sentry integration: pip install sentry-sdk|settings.py configured with Sentry DSN|Test error sent to Sentry (500 error triggered)|Error alerts configured (email/Slack)|Uptime monitoring enabled (UptimeRobot or similar)|SSL certificate expiration monitoring set up|Daily health check email (optional)

Card Description:
Run security checks and address any vulnerabilities.

**Effort:** 3 hours
**Week:** 2
**Dependencies:** Task 1.1 (SSL), Task 1.3 (Secrets)
Checklist Items: Django security check passed: python manage.py check --deploy|No security warnings in production settings|2FA tested for all manager accounts|API authentication tested (token-based endpoints)|Data isolation verified (no cross-home leaks)|SQL injection tests passed (OWASP ZAP or manual)|CSRF protection enabled and tested|XSS protection verified|Session timeout configured (30 minutes)|Password policy enforced (8+ chars, complexity)|Audit log reviewed (no suspicious activity)

Card Description:
Review and update all production documentation.

**Effort:** 2 hours
**Week:** 2
**Dependencies:** All Week 1-2 tasks
Checklist Items: SSL_SETUP_GUIDE.md reviewed and accurate|UAT_PLAN.md reviewed and ready|PILOT_DEPLOYMENT_PLAN.md reviewed and ready|BACKUP_PROCEDURES.md created|LOAD_TESTING_RESULTS.md created|Runbook created: PRODUCTION_RUNBOOK.md|All documentation committed to GitHub

Card Description:
Duration: Weeks 3-4
Owner: Service Manager + Technical Lead
Goal: Validate system readiness with 5-10 staff testers

Budget: £3,400
Effort: 120 hours
Checklist Items: 60+ test scenarios executed|≥95% test pass rate achieved|All Critical/High defects resolved|User satisfaction ≥4.0/5.0|UAT Final Report approved by Service Manager

Card Description:
Recruit 5-10 UAT testers across all roles. Set up test accounts and schedule training.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 3
**Dependencies:** Epic 1 complete
Checklist Items: 5-10 testers recruited (2-3 OMs, 1 SM, 1-2 Senior Carers, 1-2 CAs, 1 Admin)|Test accounts created (uat_om1, uat_sm, etc.)|2FA configured for Service Manager and Admin accounts|UAT kickoff meeting scheduled (Week 3, Day 1)|Test data verified (5 homes, 821 staff, shifts, leave)|UAT environment accessible: https://staging.yourdomain.com|UAT_PLAN.md distributed to all testers|Training session scheduled (2 hours, Week 3 Day 1)

Card Name: Task 2.2: UAT Week 1 Execution - Core Features
Card Description:
Execute test scenarios for authentication, leave, shifts, AI chatbot, dashboards.

**Effort:** 15 hours
**Week:** 3
**Dependencies:** Task 2.1
Checklist Items: ≥90% of Week 1 test cases executed|All Critical priority tests passed|Defects logged in GitHub Issues (with severity, screenshots)|Daily standup held (15 mins, review progress)|Mid-week survey distributed (Day 3)|Week 1 summary report compiled

Card Description:
Fix all Critical and High priority bugs discovered during UAT Week 1.

**Effort:** 10 hours
**Week:** 3
**Dependencies:** Task 2.2
Checklist Items: All Critical bugs fixed within 4 hours|All High priority bugs fixed within 24 hours|Fixes deployed to UAT environment|Regression testing completed|Defect status updated in GitHub Issues|Code changes committed to GitHub|Release notes created for fixes

Card Name: Task 2.4: UAT Week 2 Execution - Advanced Features
Card Description:
Execute remaining test scenarios: multi-home isolation, compliance, ML, performance.

**Effort:** 14 hours
**Week:** 4
**Dependencies:** Task 2.3
Checklist Items: 100% of test cases executed|All CRITICAL tests passed (data isolation, security)|≥95% of HIGH priority tests passed|≥90% of MEDIUM priority tests passed|Concurrent user test completed (6-9 testers simultaneous)|Mobile responsiveness tested (iOS + Android)|Final user feedback survey completed|Week 2 summary report compiled

Card Description:
Fix all remaining Critical/High bugs and address Medium priority issues.

**Effort:** 8 hours
**Week:** 4
**Dependencies:** Task 2.4
Checklist Items: All Critical bugs resolved|All High priority bugs resolved|≥80% of Medium priority bugs resolved|Low priority bugs documented for post-UAT|All fixes deployed and retested|Regression testing passed|Final defect log compiled

Card Name: Task 2.6: UAT Final Report & GO/NO-GO Decision
Card Description:
Compile UAT results, analyze feedback, make GO/NO-GO decision for pilot.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 4
**Dependencies:** Task 2.4, Task 2.5
Checklist Items: UAT Summary Report created (10 pages)|User satisfaction score calculated (target: ≥4.0/5.0)|All mandatory success criteria met|GO/NO-GO decision made|If GO: Pilot deployment scheduled (Week 5)|If NO-GO: Issue resolution plan created

Card Description:
Duration: Weeks 5-8
Owner: Service Manager + Technical Lead
Goal: Deploy to Hawthorn House + Meadowburn (~117 staff)

Budget: £2,063
Effort: 180 hours
Checklist Items: 2 homes operational (Hawthorn, Meadowburn)|117 staff actively using system|≥99.5% uptime achieved|User satisfaction ≥4.3/5.0|Paper rotas eliminated (100% digital)|Pilot Final Report approved

Card Description:
Complete all pre-pilot setup: data verification, training materials, staff training.

**Effort:** 20 hours
**Week:** 4-5 transition
**Dependencies:** UAT GO decision
Checklist Items: Care home data verified (Hawthorn, Meadowburn complete)|All 117 pilot staff profiles imported|Historical shifts loaded (3 months for ML)|Leave balances verified with payroll|Training records imported (18 course types)|Quick start guides printed (120 copies)|Training videos recorded (5 key features, 15 mins each)|Training sessions conducted (OMs, Senior Carers, CAs)|Go-live announcement email sent|Support hotline number published

Card Description:
Launch system at pilot homes. Provide on-site support, monitor first logins.

**Effort:** 10 hours
**Week:** 5 Monday
**Dependencies:** Task 3.1
Checklist Items: 08:00 - System health check|08:30 - Go-live email sent to all 117 pilot staff|09:00 - On-site support at Hawthorn House|13:00 - On-site support at Meadowburn|No critical incidents|≥50% of pilot staff logged in|Day 1 Summary Report completed

Card Description:
Provide extended support (8am-8pm) during first week.

**Effort:** 40 hours
**Week:** 5
**Dependencies:** Task 3.2
Checklist Items: Day 2: First shifts worked from system|Day 3: First leave auto-approvals|Day 4: First manager leave approvals|Day 5: First AI chatbot queries|≥80% pilot staff logged in|≥20 leave requests submitted|≥100 shifts created/edited|<5 medium priority issues|0 critical incidents|User satisfaction ≥3.5/5.0

Card Description:
Reduce to standard support. Focus on feature adoption.

**Effort:** 20 hours
**Week:** 6
**Dependencies:** Task 3.3
Checklist Items: On-site support 2 days/week (Wed, Fri)|Day 8: First executive dashboard usage|Day 9: First ML forecast generated|Day 14: Mid-pilot survey distributed|≥95% pilot staff active|≥50 leave requests total|≥300 shifts managed|≥50 AI chatbot queries|User satisfaction ≥4.0/5.0

Card Description:
Full transition to digital rotas. Discontinue all paper-based processes.

**Effort:** 10 hours
**Week:** 7
**Dependencies:** Task 3.4
Checklist Items: Day 15: Last paper rota discontinued at Hawthorn|Day 16: Last paper rota discontinued at Meadowburn|100% shifts managed through system|100% digital rota adoption (0% paper)|≥80 leave requests total|≥500 shifts managed|User satisfaction ≥4.2/5.0

Card Description:
Reduce to minimal support (on-demand only).

**Effort:** 10 hours
**Week:** 7
**Dependencies:** Task 3.5
Checklist Items: On-site support 1 day/week (Thursday)|Day 19: First automated compliance alert|Day 21: Week 3 user survey + manager interviews|Support tickets <3/day|No critical or high priority issues|User confidence high

Card Description:
Monitor system stability, collect final feedback.

**Effort:** 10 hours
**Week:** 8
**Dependencies:** Task 3.6
Checklist Items: Day 22: System performance review|Day 24: Security audit (data isolation, auth logs)|Day 26: Final user survey distributed|Day 28: Pilot review meeting|Uptime ≥99.5%|User satisfaction ≥4.3/5.0|≥100 leave requests total|≥700 shifts managed

Card Description:
Compile pilot results, evaluate success criteria.

**Effort:** 6 hours
**Week:** 8 Friday
**Dependencies:** Task 3.7
Checklist Items: Pilot Summary Report created (15 pages)|All mandatory success criteria met|GO/NO-GO decision for phased rollout|If GO: Riverside deployment scheduled (Week 9)|Lessons learned documented|Updated training materials

Card Description:
Duration: Weeks 9-10
Owner: Service Manager + OMs
Goal: Deploy to Riverside (Week 9) and Victoria Gardens (Week 10)

Effort: 80 hours
Checklist Items: 4 homes operational|~330 staff using system (40% of total)|All homes stable with minimal support|Multi-home dashboard functional

Card Description:
Prepare Riverside for deployment. Data verification, staff training.

**Effort:** 12 hours
**Week:** 9 Mon-Wed
**Dependencies:** Pilot GO decision
Checklist Items: Riverside data verified (staff profiles, shifts, leave)|Training materials updated (lessons from pilot)|Training sessions conducted (OMs, Senior Carers, CAs)|Go-live announcement sent|Quick start guides distributed|Test accounts created for OMs

Card Description:
Deploy to Riverside. Provide on-site support Thursday-Friday.

**Effort:** 20 hours
**Week:** 9 Thu-Fri
**Dependencies:** Task 4.1
Checklist Items: Thursday: Go-live|Friday: Full day on-site support|≥70% Riverside staff logged in by Friday|First leave requests submitted|First shifts created|No critical incidents

Card Description:
Prepare Victoria Gardens. Leverage lessons from 3 previous homes.

**Effort:** 12 hours
**Week:** 10 Mon-Wed
**Dependencies:** Task 4.2 (Riverside stable)
Checklist Items: Victoria Gardens data verified|Training materials refined (3rd iteration)|Training sessions conducted|Go-live announcement sent|Materials distributed|Test accounts created

Card Description:
Deploy to Victoria Gardens. 4th home deployment.

**Effort:** 20 hours
**Week:** 10 Thu-Fri
**Dependencies:** Task 4.3
Checklist Items: Thursday: Go-live|Friday: On-site support|≥80% Victoria staff logged in by Friday|First workflows completed|No critical incidents|Riverside week 2 also monitored

Card Description:
Review executive multi-home dashboard with all 4 homes.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 10 Friday
**Dependencies:** 4 homes operational
Checklist Items: Executive dashboard shows all 4 homes|Comparative metrics working (staffing, leave, sickness, training, coverage)|CI Performance Dashboard peer benchmarking updated|Budget variance tracking across all homes|No data cross-contamination (isolation verified)

Card Description:
Duration: Weeks 11-12
Owner: Service Manager
Goal: Deploy 5th home, achieve full production

Effort: 60 hours
Checklist Items: All 5 homes operational|821 staff active|System performance optimized|Compliance verified|Support model established|12-week retrospective complete

Card Description:
Prepare final care home for deployment.

**Effort:** 10 hours
**Week:** 11 Mon-Wed
**Dependencies:** 4 homes stable
Checklist Items: 5th home identified|Data verified|Training conducted (streamlined, 1-day process)|Go-live scheduled for Thursday

Card Description:
Final home deployment. Complete coverage of all 5 care homes.

**Effort:** 16 hours
**Week:** 11 Thu-Fri
**Dependencies:** Task 5.1
Checklist Items: Thursday: Successful go-live|Friday: On-site support|≥85% staff logged in by Friday|All workflows functional|No critical incidents across all 5 homes

Card Description:
Announce full production achievement. Celebrate success.

**Effort:** 2 hours
**Week:** 11 Friday
**Dependencies:** Task 5.2
Checklist Items: Email announcement to all 821 staff|Executive briefing to Head of Service|Success metrics compiled|Internal newsletter article|Thank you to pilot homes and UAT testers

Card Description:
Comprehensive performance review across all homes.

**Effort:** 6 hours
**Week:** 12 Mon-Tue
**Dependencies:** All 5 homes live 1 week
Checklist Items: Page load times measured (all dashboards)|Database query performance analyzed|Server resource utilization reviewed|Bottlenecks identified|Optimization plan created (if needed)|Capacity planning for growth

Card Description:
Review executive dashboards with all 5 homes data.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 12 Wed
**Dependencies:** All 5 homes data available
Checklist Items: All 7 executive dashboards tested|Multi-home comparisons working|Chart.js visualizations rendering correctly|Excel exports functional|Traffic light indicators accurate|Benchmark calculations correct|Service Manager satisfied with insights

Card Description:
Verify compliance monitoring and audit trail completeness.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 12 Thu
**Dependencies:** 2 weeks of production data
Checklist Items: Audit trail tested (leave approvals, shift changes, user actions, admin actions)|Compliance rules running (training alerts, supervision alerts, induction tracking, incidents)|Care Inspectorate data accurate|No compliance gaps identified

Card Description:
Conduct comprehensive retrospective on 12-week implementation.

**Effort:** 3 hours
**Week:** 12 Friday
**Dependencies:** Week 12 end
Checklist Items: Retrospective meeting held (all 9 OMs, SM, Technical Lead)|What went well documented|What could be improved documented|Surprises/learnings captured|Recommendations for future projects|Success stories collected (testimonials)|Metrics compiled

Card Description:
Formalize ongoing support model. Transition to steady-state operations.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 12 Friday
**Dependencies:** Task 5.7
Checklist Items: Support tiers defined (4 tiers)|Support hours: 9am-5pm Mon-Fri|Emergency contact for critical issues|Monthly review meeting scheduled (ongoing)|Quarterly user satisfaction survey scheduled|Annual system health check scheduled|Support SLA documented|Handover complete

Card Description:
Duration: Week 13+
Owner: Service Manager + Head of Service
Goal: Prepare and deliver pitch to Glasgow HSCP

Effort: 16 hours
Checklist Items: Pitch deck created|Demo rehearsed|Pitch delivered to Glasgow HSCP|Next steps agreed

Card Name: Task 6.1: Glasgow HSCP Pitch Deck Creation
Card Description:
Create executive presentation for Glasgow HSCP.

**Effort:** 8 hours
**Week:** 13
**Dependencies:** Full production achieved
Checklist Items: Pitch deck created: GLASGOW_HSCP_PITCH.md|10 sections included (Problem, Solution, AI/ML, Cost, ROI, Timeline, Risk, Support, Demo, Q&A)|PowerPoint slides created (20-30 slides)|Demo environment prepared|Case study compiled (Hawthorn testimonial)|ROI calculator spreadsheet created

Card Description:
Rehearse live demo for Glasgow HSCP presentation.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 13
**Dependencies:** Task 6.1
Checklist Items: Demo script written (7 sections, 15 mins total)|Demo data prepared (realistic scenarios)|Rehearsal completed (timed to 15 mins)|Backup plan for technical issues|Screen recording created (backup)

Card Description:
Deliver pitch to Glasgow HSCP stakeholders.

**Effort:** 4 hours
**Week:** 14+
**Dependencies:** Task 6.2
Checklist Items: Meeting scheduled with Glasgow HSCP decision-makers|Pitch deck presented (30 mins)|Live demo conducted (15 mins)|Q&A handled (15 mins)|Follow-up materials provided|Next steps agreed (pilot with HSCP homes or full rollout)
